value.title: Get Started with Power BI PowerShell | Install PowerShell Cmdlets for Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, we will talk about how we can get started with the Power BI PowerShell. For any organization, if we wish to perform some admin related tasks easily and in faster manner, PowerShell is the best option. So many operations we can perform very easily and faster.
